comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
I wonder if the pram the boy is wheeling was a common type - it's so different to the strollers/prams of today.
AB

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw] Yes, it looks like a wooden collapsible or foldable. Could not find much about the history of prams, except this, "The First Perambulator" !
